dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“I couldn't ask you to go.
I knew it would be dangerous.”

“You have to go through the slum in
{CYAN}Sector 6{WHITE} to get to
{Tifa}'s {CYAN}7th Heaven{WHITE}.”{PAUSE}“I'll take you there. Come on!”

do ya think you're talkin' to!?”
